snippet: The Cleveland Browns matched a five-year, $42 million offer from the Jacksonville Jaguars for their Pro Bowl center, Alex Mack.
abstract: Cleveland Browns match a five-year, $42 million offer from the Jacksonville Jaguars in order to keep their Pro Bowl center Alex Mack, who will receive $26 million guaranteed in the deal.
lead_paragraph: The Cleveland Browns matched a five-year, $42 million offer from the Jacksonville Jaguars for their Pro Bowl center, Alex Mack.

headline.main: Browns Retain Pro Bowler Alex Mack
